item.description:
A weekend spiritual seminar! 

We invite you to the annual Connecticut Eckankar Regional Seminar where we meet to explore the spiritual nature of ourselves as Soul through workshops, group discussions, talks and creative arts.

We will have a variety of dynamic speakers to inspire you on your own personal quest. Come share a weekend filled with opportunity to explore your inner worlds. Please feel welcome to bring a friend. The seminar is free to newcomers.

Friday, July 8th, 7:30 to 9:30PM at the Eckankar Temple

Saturday 9:15AM to 9:30PM at the Crowne Plaza Hotel in Cromwell

Sunday 9AM to 12:20PM at the Eckankar Temple.

 

For more information about the seminar, visit:

www.ct-eckankar.org or email eckinfo@ct-eckankar.org.
item.how_to_find_us: Friday night and Sunday morning at the Temple, Saturday at the Crowne Plaza Hotel,

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Spiritual Seminar: The Awakened Heart
